text: Youth of PAICV () is the youth organisation of the African Party for the Independence of Cape Verde. == History == The organisation was founded on September 12, 1974 as African Youth Amílcar Cabral (Juventude Africana Amílcar Cabral) as the youth organisation for the African Party for the Independence of Guinea and Cape Verde, which operated in both Cape Verde and Guinea-Bissau. When the Cape Verdean section of PAIGC formed its own party, the organisation was renamed Youth of PAICV. == Organisation == JPAI is a full member of the International Union of Socialist Youth. Category:African Party for the Independence of Cape Verde Category:Youth wings of political parties in Cape Verde Category:Youth wings of social democratic parties
title: Youth of PAICV
